Source code for thermography.test.test_ID

import unittest

import numpy as np

from thermography.utils import ID



[docs]class TestIDUtils(unittest.TestCase):

[docs]    def test_ID_generator(self):
        """
        Tests the values of the generated IDs.
        """
        self.assertEqual(ID.next_id(), 0)

        num_tests = 10
        for i in range(num_tests):
            initial_id = np.random.randint(-100, 100)
            ID.reset_id(initial_id)
            num_steps = 100
            for step in range(num_steps):
                self.assertEqual(ID.next_id(), initial_id + step)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()
